errors.bad-connection: Umuhora wawe ushobora kuba utameze neza. Ursubira kugerageza hanyuma canke urondere uwundi muhora
errors.chat-connection-unhealthy: Guhuza ibiganiro ntibimeze neza canke nturi ku murongo. Ugerageze hanyuma canke usubiremwo apu
errors.chat-list-render-error: Nahuye n'ikibazo co kwerekana ibiganiro vyawe
errors.chat-message-render-error: Nahuye n'ikibazo co kwerekana ubu butumwa
errors.chat-unavailable: Iri shirahamwe ntirifise urubuga rwo kuganira.
errors.get-nostr-pubkey-failed: Kunanirwa kubona urufunguzo rwa Nostr pub
errors.insufficient-balance: Ufise amahera adakwiye. Ufise {{balance}} mu ngodomoni yawe
errors.invalid-username: Itegerezwa kuba indome ziri munsi canke zishika 21 hatarimwo nkuru
errors.no-lightning-gateways: Nta lightning gateways ziboneka kuri uyu mukoresha
errors.please-force-quit-the-app: Ikosa ryabaye, ni ngombwa kuva kuri apu hanyuma usubire ugerageze
errors.recovery-failed: Kugarura vyanse, ni ngombwa usubire kugerageza

backup.camera-access-information: Kugirango ubike imibereho, uzokenera kwemerera Fedi kugera kuri kamera yawe gufata videwo yo kugenzura
backup.choose-method-instructions: Kubika ingodo yawe bizogufasha kugaruza amafaranga yawe niba utakaje Fedi
backup.cloud-backup-instructions: Bika ya dosiye yawe yo kugarura mububiko bwa Cloud. Uzosabwa kandi kubika iyi dosiye ku ncuti canke umuryango
backup.hold-record-button: Fata buto yo kwandika hanyuma uvuge:
backup.personal-backup-instructions: Andika amajambo 12 yo kugarura. Ibi ni kubanyamuryango babimenyereye
backup.please-review-backup-video: subira urabe videwo ziri mu bubiko
backup.press-record-button: Fyonda aho gufata videwo canke amajwi hanyuma uvuge:
backup.recovery-words-instructions: Andika aya magambo hasi ukoresheje ikaramu n'impapuro. Ntukabike aya magambo muburyo bwa digitale kubikoresho byawe.
backup.review-face-confirmation: Ndemeza ko mu maso hanje hashobora kugaragara neza muriyi videwo
backup.review-voice-confirmation: Ndemeza ko ijwi ryanje rishobora kwumvikana neza muriyi videwo
backup.save-your-wallet-backup-file: Bika dosiye y'ingodo yawe mu bubiko
backup.save-your-wallet-backup-file-where: Turasaba kubika dosiye yawe ahantu hatandukanye (messaging apps, email, cloud storage, etc.)
backup.social-backup-instructions: Fata videwo kugirango werekane umwidondoro wawe. Iri hitamwo niryiza nimba uzi neza abarinzi bawe.
backup.start-personal-backup-instructions: Rondera ikaramu n'urupapuro hama wandike amajambo yo kugarura kuri mugaragaza ikurikira
backup.start-social-backup-instructions: Kubika imibereho bigufasha gusubiza neza ingodo yawe hamwe n'abagenzi n'umuryango kandi ukagira abarinzi b'ishirahamwe bagufasha kuyigarura vyanse ko winjira
backup.successfully-backed-up: Wabitse neza ingodo yawe ya Fedi
backup.video-file-too-large: Idosiye ya videwo ni nini cane, nkwinginge ufate ngufi

bug.description-placeholder: Wari witeze iki hama vyagenze gute ahubwo?
bug.info-label: Kurungika ishirahamwe hamwe n'izina kumwe na raporo ya bug
bug.log-disclaimer: Gusaba log bizoshirwa muri raporo yawe mugufasha abahinga ba Fedi gusuzuma ikibazo

chat.broadcast-no-message: Abayobozi nta makuru baratanga. Mugume ku murongo
chat.broadcast-only-notice: Psst, abayobozi bonyene nibo bashobora kurungika ubutumwa hano 🤫
chat.leave-group-confirmation: Vy'ukuri urashaka kuva mu murwi? Ubutumwa bwose buca mufudika
chat.member-not-found: Nta munywanyi afise iri zina twabonye '{{username}}'
chat.need-registration-description: Shiraho izina riri bugaragare kugira ushobore kurungika kandi uronke ay'abandi
chat.no-messages: Nta biganiro biraba muri kino cumba
chat.no-one-is-in-this-group: Nta amunywanyi ari hano muriki cumba
chat.select-or-start: Hitamwo ibiganiro canke utangure ikindi kiganiro
chat.upgrade-chat-guidance: Twakajije umutekano w' ibiganiro vya Fedi kandi bikoreshwa n'abantu bo mu mihingo yose

federations.leave-federation-withdraw-first: Utegerezwa gukuramwo amafaranga yawe imbere y'uko uvamwo
federations.leave-federation-withdraw-pending-stable: Turacakora kw'ibikurwa {{currency}} yawe. Ihangane usubire mu minota 10
federations.leave-federation-withdraw-stable-first: Utegerezwa gukuramwo {{currency}}  yawe yarasigaye yose imbere y'uko uvamwo

fedimods.add-mods-homescreen: Shiramwo Mods kuri kaze ya Fedi yawe
fedimods.debug-mode-info: Gushiramwo igikoresho ca dev (Eruda) muri mushakisha mugihe ufunguye Fedi Mods
fedimods.leave-page-confirmation: Vy'ukuri urashaka kuva kur'uru rupapuro? Ivyahindutse bishobora kutaba vyabitswe
fedimods.stable-balance-enabled-info: Gushobora guhindura sats mu mafaranga ahamye

fees.guidance-ecash: Vyiza cane! Kurungikira amafaranga abagenzi bari mw'ishirahamwe ryawe birazimbutsa kandi biroroshe kuruta- kandi biraryoshe pe  😎
fees.guidance-lightning: 🤑 Urashaka kubika kuyo usabwa? Rungika mubiganro ahubwo
fees.guidance-onchain: Kurungika kuri on-chain ya  bitcoin bitangirwa amafaranga y'umuhora. Mu kuri, wopfuma wongereza amafaranga bihuye
fees.guidance-stable-balance: *Aya niyo menshi ushobora kwishura kugirango ugire ico ugumanye ku mwaka. Ashobora kuba make! 😉

omni.camera-permission-denied: Ja kuri mwimerere uhindure impusha za kamera
omni.confirm-ecash-token: Iki n'igiharuro ca eCash token, uripfuza kukizigama?
omni.confirm-fedi-chat: Aha niho uca kugira uje mu biganiro, urashaka kujayo?
omni.confirm-lightning-pay: Iki n'icipfuzo co kuriha kuri lightning, urashaka kuriha?
omni.confirm-lightning-withdraw: Iki n'icipfuzo co kubikura kuri lightning, urashaka kubikura?
omni.confirm-onchain-pay: Uku n'ukuriha kwa bitcoin onchain, urashaka kuriha?
omni.confirm-website-url: Iyi ni url ya website, urashaka kuyugurura muri mushakisha yawe?
omni.search-placeholder-username-or-ln: Injiza izina canke aho lightning ibarizwa
omni.unsupported-legacy-chat: Ubu butumwa QR buvuye kuri app itacemewe. Mpore!
omni.unsupported-no-federation: Ntushobora gukoresha ivyo utarinjira ishirahamwe. Ahubwo gerageza usuzume ubutumire bw'ishirahamwe
omni.unsupported-on-chain: On-chain bitcoin aho ibarizwa ntihemewe. Mpore!

onboarding.by-clicking-i-accept: Mugufyonda 'Ndemeye' wemera amasezerano ya serivisi kuri {{tos_url}}
onboarding.chat-earn-save-spend: Kuganira, kunguka, kuzigama, no gukoresha amafaranga wenyene hamwe n'abantu bawe
onboarding.greeting-instructions: Ubu uzoshobora kurungika amafaranga, kuvugana n'abanyagihugu b'iwanyu, n'ibindi vyinshi na Fedi.
onboarding.guidance-1: Kuganira, kwunguka, kuzigama, no gukoresha amafaranga wenyene hamwe n'abanyagihugu bawe
onboarding.guidance-2: Fedi ikoresha umuryango wawe kugirango vyoroshe kubika no kurinda amafaranga yawe, guhindura amafaranga yaho canke kubona ubufasha.
onboarding.guidance-3: Hamwe na Fedi ufite amafaranga asigaye, kwishura no gutumanaho byanze bikunze, nta mbaraga.
onboarding.guidance-4: Fedi ikoresha umuhora wa bitcoin na lightning kugirango iguhuza amahirwe yisi yose kugirango ubone amafaranga kumurongo uko ubishaka.
onboarding.guidance-public-federations: Gerageza umuryango uva kurutonde rwiza rwa Fedimint
onboarding.new-users-disabled-notice: Ihangane, iri shirahamwe ntiririko rirakira abawukoresha bashasha
onboarding.username-instructions: Izina ukoresha ryawe nuburyo abandi banyamuryango bazokumenya.
onboarding.welcome-instructions-new: Nk'umunyamuryango musha w'ishirahamwe, uzoronka ingodomoni nsha.
onboarding.welcome-instructions-returning: Nk'umunyamuryango yagarutse mw'ishirahamwe, ingodomoni yawe izogarurwa. Ibi birashobora gufata iminota mike.
onboarding.welcome-instructions-unknown: Abanyamuryango basha bakira ingodomoni nsha. Abanyamuryango bagarutse bazosubizwa ingodomoni yabo ya kera mu buryo bwikora.

parser.unsupported-bolt11-zero-amount: Amafaranga zero ntiyemerwa kuri fagitire ya Lightning. Kora fagitire nsha hamwe n'amafaranga hanyuma ugerageze kandi.

permissions.allow-camera-description: Gusikana/gusuzuma QR kode, amazina ukoresha mu biganiro, kurungika amafaranga, n'ibindi vyinshi
permissions.allow-notifications-description: Ubutumwa busha bwo kuganira, kwishura, n'amatangazo

pin.backup-notice: Ukaba wibagiye PIN yawe, ububiko bwawe niyo nzira yonyene yo gusubira kugarura ikonti yawe.

popup.ending-description: Iri shirahamwe ry'imfatakibanza rizohera <bold>will end {{date}}</bold>. Amafaranga asigaye azokoreshwa mw'ibanga n'abarinzi

receive.balance-not-spendable-offline: Amafaranga asigaye ntushobora kuyakoresha gushika ugarutse k'umuhora

recovery.camera-access-information: Mu gufashwa kugaruza, uzokenera kwemerera Fedi kugera kuri kamera yawe kugira ngo isuzume kode yo kugaruza imibereho
recovery.choose-method-instructions: Hitamo uburyo wakoresheje mu kubika ingodo yawe igihe winjira ubwa mbere {{federation}}
recovery.create-new-wallet-guidance: Iyi ngodomoni uzoyigeraho gusa kuriyi gikoresho, kiretse nimba ugaruje & urungitse ku kindi gikoresho
recovery.from-different-device: Kuva ku gikoresho kindi kugeza kuri iki
recovery.guardian-approval-instructions: Abarinzi bakeneye kwemeza ko wa umuntu muri Video yawe ya Fedi Intro kugirango ugaruze amafaranga yawe
recovery.guardian-qr-instructions: Abarinzi bazokenera gusikana/ gusuzuma iyi QR code kugirango batangure kugaruza imibereho
recovery.locate-social-recovery-instructions-1: Urashobora kuba warasangije iyi dosiye n'abagenzi canke ukayibika ahantu hatandukanye:
recovery.locate-social-recovery-instructions-3: Izina rya dosiye ya Fedi risa:
recovery.locked-device-guidance-1: Ingodomoni yo kuri iki gikoresho yimuriwe mu kindi gikoresho.
recovery.locked-device-guidance-3: Niba ushaka gushiraho iyindi ngodomoni kuri iki gikoresho, yewe futa kandi wongere usubizemwo Fedi. 👍
recovery.migrated-device-guidance-1: Fedi irashobora gukoreshwa kuri telefone imwe gusa mu gihe kimwe. Kugira uhindurire konte yawe hano mu mutekano:
recovery.migrated-device-guidance-3: 2️⃣ Kura Fedi kuri iyi telefone hanyuma uyishireho ubwa kabiri
recovery.migrated-device-guidance-4: ⚠️ Banza ubike kugira ntutakaze uburyo bwo kubona amafaranga yawe!
recovery.migrated-device-success-guidance-2:
Noneho, kura Fedi kuri iyi telefone hanyuma uyishireho ubwa kabiri.

 Ibuka gukoresha amajambo wanditse kugira usubize konte yawe.
recovery.migrated-device-success-guidance-3: Nimba ukeneye imfashanyo, <anchor>kanda hano</anchor> kugira uhamagare ikipe yacu y'imfashanyo
recovery.opening-backup-file-failed-instructions: Dosiye ya  backup {{fileName}} yanse kwuguruka. Yewe gerageza hama ugaruze ukuye ahandi hantu wayisangije
recovery.paste-social-recovery-code-instead: Ahubwo bika ikode yo kugaruza imibereho
recovery.personal-recovery-instructions: Injiza y'amajambo 12 wanditse mu gihe ca mbere ubika ingodomoni yawe
recovery.personal-recovery-method: Nimba wanditse amajambo 12 yo kugaruza urashobora kwongera kuyinjizamo kugirango ugarure ingodomoni yawe
recovery.recovery-assist-confirm-check-1: Umunywanyi muri kumwe amerewe neza, aratekanye kandi ntabuze amahoro/ntahugumba
recovery.recovery-assist-confirm-check-2: Ibidukikije umuntu vyose biri m' umutekano
recovery.recovery-assist-description: Umunywanyi w'ishirahamwe ryawe aragusavye ngo umufashe kugaruza ingodomoni yiwe
recovery.recovery-assist-instructions-3: 3. Raba ububiko bw'ama videwo yabo ya Fedi
recovery.recovery-assist-instructions-4: 4. Emeza ko ari umuntu umwe mu bubiko bwa videwo
recovery.recovery-assist-instructions-5: 5. Kwemeza canke guhakana icifuzo co kugaruza c'abanywanyi
recovery.recovery-assist-thank-you: Urakoze gufasha kugaruza amafaranga k'umunywanyi w'ishirahamwe
recovery.recovery-confirm-identity-instructions-1: Raba videwo kugira ngo wemeze umwidondoro w'umunywanyi
recovery.recovery-confirm-identity-instructions-2: Iyi videwo yerekana umunywanyi  ariko agerageza gukora socal recovery ubunyene?
recovery.recovery-confirm-identity-no: Oya, umuntu ari muri videwo s'umwe n'umuntu w'umunywanyi
recovery.recovery-confirm-identity-yes: Nivyo, umuntu ari muri videwo n' umuntu umwe n'umunywanyi
recovery.recovery-in-progress-balance: Kugaruza kurabandanya. Amafaranga asigaye azoboneka vuba.
recovery.recovery-in-progress-chat-payments: Kugaruza kurabandanya. Ibiganiro vy'ubucuruzi bizoboneka vuba.
recovery.select-a-device-guidance: Hitamwo igikoresho co kurungikako ingodomoni yarihasanzwe kuva
recovery.social-recovery-instructions: Ugurura dosiye ya  social recovery Fedi yashizweho igihe wafata videwo ya backup.Twagusavye kubika kubika dosiye no kuyisangiza abagenzi
recovery.social-recovery-method: Nimba warafashe videwo, vugana n'abarezi bawe  kugirango bemeze umwidondoro wawe
recovery.social-recovery-unsuccessful-instruction: Gerageza gusubira ku barezi no kwerekana umwidondoro wawe.
recovery.successfully-opened-fedi-file: Dosiye yawe ya Fedi yugurutse neza
recovery.transfer-existing-wallet-guidance-1: Ibi bizozana ingodomoni yawe iri kuri iki gikoresho hanyuma ufunge ingodo ku kindi gikoresho.
recovery.transfer-existing-wallet-guidance-2: Ntukeneye igikoresho ca kera kugirango urungike.

send.copied-offline-payment: Ivyo wishuye utari ku murongo vyakoporowe
send.offline-send-warning: Ku ntambwe ikurikira, niyo QR yerekanwa, sats zizokurwa ku ngodomoni yawe

stabilitypool.amount-may-vary-during-withdraw: Igitigiri gishobora guhinduka mu gihe co kubikura
stabilitypool.max-stable-balance-amount: Washitse ku gitigiri ntarengwa c'amafaranga asigara
stabilitypool.no-bitcoin-notice: Ugomba kuba ufise bitcoin kugirango ubike mu {{currency}} asigaye
stabilitypool.pending-withdrawal-blocking: Yewe rindira kubikura kurarindiriye imbere yuko usubira kubitsa canke kubikuza

wallet.show-fiat-txn-amounts-info: Amafaranga yavuye mubudandaji azoboneka mubwoko  fiat bwamafaranga yahiswemwo
